title: Anthroposophy Definition & Meaning | Dictionary.com
description: Anthroposophy definition, a philosophy based on the teachings of Rudolf Steiner (1861-1925) which maintains that, by virtue of a prescribed method of self-discipline, cognitional experience of the spiritual world can be achieved. See more.
